text: Ndi pamene mudati: “oh Mose! Ife sitingapirire kudya chakudya chamtundu umodzi. Motero tipemphere kwa Ambuye wako kuti atitulutsire zina mwa zomera m’nthaka monga masamba, minkhaka, tirigu, nyemba ndi anyezi.” Iye adati: “Kodi inu mufuna kusinthitsa chinthu chabwino ndi choipa? Pitani ku mzinda uliwonse ndipo kumeneko mudzapeza zonse zimene mufuna.” Ndipo manyazi ndi umphawi udadza pa iwo ndipo iwo adapalamula mkwiyo wa Mulungu chifukwa iwo adali kukana mau a Mulungu ndipo anali kupha Atumwi popanda chifukwa popeza iwo adali anthu aupandu ndi anthu osamvera
